name: ChoiceMaker
0:
”Alexa, open Choice Maker.”
”Alexa, ask Choice Maker to pick burger or pizza.”
”Alexa, ask Choice Maker should I cut my hair or not?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: choice maker
des: Don’t know what to cook? Don't know what to wear? Don't know what to watch? Choice Maker can help you with these and any other choice you might need! Just give it both options and it will choose for you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
